item.title: Michael Amaya
item.description:
Hi, My name is Michael Amaya!

I’m a software engineer with 8+ years experience building software that scale fast and work reliably under pressure. I have a passion for solving real-world problems through software and love working with Go and Python.

 

Whether it’s architecting backend systems or writing graceful architecture, I always look for clean, efficient solutions that just work.

 

Why this blog?

I started this blog to share what I’ve learned, document my thought process, and (hopefully) help others who may be facing the same challenges I’ve run into. I know I’ve gotten a lot of help from the community, through stackoverflow or GitHub. This is my way to give back to the community!

item.title: Nathaniel Wilson
item.description:
Hi, My name is Nathaniel Wilson

Experienced engineer with over 17 years in software development and 10+ years in systems engineering, bringing a strong foundation in designing, building, and maintaining complex, high-performance systems. Passionate about technology, lifelong learning, and cybersecurity, with a proven track record of adapting to emerging trends and solving challenging technical problems. Combines deep technical expertise with a strategic mindset to deliver robust, scalable solutions across diverse environments.
